choices.C: Change the IKE mode to aggressive.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
BC refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 182
I think correct answer is B,C

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

When attempting to establish an IPsec tunnel to FortiGate, all remote users match the FIRST_VPN IPsec VPN. This includes remote users that want to connect to the SECOND_VPN IPsec VPN.
Which two configuration changes must you make on both IPsec VPNs so that remote users can connect to their intended IPsec VPN? (Choose two.)

choices.B: The number of concurrent sessions for 10.1.10.1 exceeded the maximum number of concurrent sessions configured in the firewall policy, and the packet was dropped.
choices.D: The total number of daily sessions for 10.1.10.1 exceeded the maximum number of concurrent sessions configured in the traffic shaper, and the packet was dropped.
choices.C: The packet size exceeded the outgoing interface MTU.
choices.A: The number of concurrent sessions for 10.1.10.1 exceeded the maximum number of concurrent sessions configured in the traffic shaper, and the packet was dropped.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A

Selected Answer: A
A refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 137
I think correct answer is A

questions.question_text: Which statement is correct about the SD-WAN and ADVPN?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 224

choices.A: Spoke support dynamic VPN as a static interface.
choices.C: ADVPN interface can be a member of SD-WAN interface.
choices.D: Hub FortiGate is limited to use ADVPN as SD-WAN member interface.
choices.B: Dynamic VPN is not supported as an SD-WAN interface.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 226

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

choices.C: The number of members to use for load balancing the traffic.
choices.D: The number of routes to use for the SD-WAN rule.
choices.B: The tag that identifies destination subnets based on their BGP communities.
choices.A: The priority of the SD-WAN rule.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

Two hub-and-spoke groups are connected through a site-to-site IPsec VPN between Hub 1 and Hub 2. The administrator configured ADVPN on both hub-and- spoke groups.
Which two outcomes are expected if a user in Toronto sends traffic to London? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Toronto needs to establish a site-to-site tunnel with Hub 2 to bypass Hub 1.
choices.D: London generates an IKE information message that contains the Toronto public IP address.
choices.C: Traffic from Toronto to London triggers the dynamic negotiation of a direct site-to-site VPN.
choices.B: The first packets from Toronto to London are routed through Hub 1 then to Hub 2.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
BC refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 207
